QueryResult.text: SELECT JOBDEF.ID, JOBDEF_CAP.NAME, JOBDEF_CAP.LANGUAGE_CODE, JOBDEF.EXECUTABLE, JOBDEF.JOB_TYPE, ATTR.COLUMN_NAME, ATTR.DATA_TYPE, ATTR.DEFAULT_VALUE, ATTR.IS_REQUIRED, ATTR.REFERENCED_OBJECT_CARDINALITY, ATTR.REFERENCED_OBJECT_ID FROM CMN_SCH_JOB_DEFINITIONS JOBDEF, CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS JOBDEF_CAP, CMN_BUSINESS_OBJECTS BO, CMN_ATTRIBUTES ATTR WHERE JOBDEF.ID = JOBDEF_CAP.PK_ID AND JOBDEF_CAP.TABLE_NAME = 'CMN_SCH_JOB_DEFINITIONS' AND BO.PK_ID = JOBDEF.ID AND BO.TABLE_NAME = 'CMN_SCH_JOB_DEFINITIONS' AND ATTR.PK_ID = BO.ID AND ATTR.TABLE_NAME = 'CMN_BUSINESS_OBJECTS'
